name: Increased serotonin syndrome risk with multiple serotonergic drugs
actions: Avoid unnecessary combinations of serotonergic drugs (educational).
Monitor for symptoms of serotonin toxicity (agitation, tremor, hyperreflexia, diaphoresis, fever).
Use extra caution when adding or increasing serotonergic agents.

rationale: Combined serotonergic effects can increase syndrome risk.

explanation_template: {A_name} and {B_name} both increase serotonin syndrome risk. Combined use can increase serotonin toxicity risk, especially with higher doses or additional serotonergic agents.

references.citation: PD stacking: multiple serotonergic agents increase serotonin toxicity risk.
